item.description:
** UPDATE **

Well, we're all set for our private tasting event this evening. Thanks to everyone for paying in advance, it's made my life a lot easier. Please note the event is approximately 2 hours long and will start promptly at 6:30pm, so please arrive to Caseus a few minutes early so we can all be seated and ready to start at the arranged time. Thanks and I'll see everyone tonight!!!

**************************************

Does goat cheese make you giddy?

Does warm Brie on a baguette bring a smile to your face?

Don't you think cheese always tastes better with wine?

If so, then join the New Haven Collective for our very own private tasting event at Caseus Fromagerie and Bistro. Caseus is a new bistro located at the corner of Whitney and Trumbull in New Haven that specializes in unique artisan cheeses from various regions of the world.

Our private event will include a seasonal selection of eight (8) different cheeses each paired with a wine and/or beer to compliment the specific flavor. Detailed information on the cheese and wine/beer selections will be made available closer to the event date, but you can check here to see some of the previous tasting selections

In addition, Jason (the "cheese guru" as they say) will provide us with information regarding the proper pairing of wine and cheese as well as humorous stories regarding the process of cheese making.......he mentioned a 4:30am milking trip that involved goats and poison ivy

Due to space limitations at Caseus, this event is limited to 25 NHC members and guests so RSVP early to guarantee yourself a spot.

The cost for the approximately two (2) hour long tasting event is $30 per person.

Your contact for this event is: Jeanie - 203-494-3518

Please Note: The $30 fee must be paid in advance, to me, in order to reserve your spot for the event. RSVPing yes does not guarnatee a place at the tasting untill I have received your payment. I will be at several NHC events prior to the tasting or you can email me and set up arrangements for payment.

The following people have paid to reserve their spot for this event:
Jeanie
Mandy
Andrea
Tom
Jim
Robyn
Ben
Michelle
Elsbeth
Kim + 3 guests
Antoinette
Melissa
Danita
Karen

So if you're looking for some cheesy information or just a fun night with friends come join us!!
item.name: Say Cheese - and maybe wine a little too!
